#include <stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() 
{int N,res,even_count=0,odd_count=0,a[100001]={0};
	cin>>N;
	for(int i=0;i<N;++i)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
		if(a[i]%2==0)
		even_count++;
		else
		odd_count++;
	}
if(even_count>=odd_count)
{
		res=even_count-odd_count;
cout<<res<<"\n";
}
else
{
res=odd_count-even_count;
cout<<res<<"\n";
}

 return 0;
	
}
